programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a gift to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep913
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floating Royal Carriage - After Sweetie decides to commandeer the Princess's royal carriage and horses, Sid the pirate sends Arrby to steal it.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Polly Parrot - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Peppa and George decide to play a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Playgroup - Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep913
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Mighty Eel - When an eel accidentally swallows a piece of the meteor and becomes gigantic, it's up to the Mighty Pups to save Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubbles dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundos dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze / Squid N' Playl / Board to Tears - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day. // Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions. // When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Undercover Tomato - Tomato paints himself green and goes undercover as a Mini Pea to discover how Evil Pea is firing them at Tato Tower. He makes an unexpected new Mini Pea friend.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels are all hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, and the squirrels are inspired to make their own collections and then display their precious things in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Tomatina Festival, Buol, Spain - The Go Jetters get caught up in Spain's Tomatina Festival. The Tomato Battle takes place every August in the town of Bunol, near to Valencia.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Whale Rescue - After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big and Small - Kit and Pup are at the park playing with a tennis ball, a basketball and a beach ball. Can you see which is the biggest and which is the smallest?

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Bubble - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bubble' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Rain - A cloud appears in Teletubbyland and it rains. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch the flowers bloom. Another cloud appears and it rains pink, Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Peekaboo - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Major's Low-Gravity Backpack - It's the Clangers' cleaning day. All the Clangers are doing a good job dusting but how will they reach all the dustweeds they can see on the ceiling of the living cave?

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Mae-Mae's Precious Pearl - Mae-Mae finds a very precious pearl on the beach. But when the pearl is taken, the friends must go on a submarine adventure to get it back.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep12
programme.desc: A Whiff of Home - Team Tinpo help a lost dog get home, by a nose!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep34

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Messy Antics - During Mayor Oki's birthday picnic, Messy and friends get in trouble with Zam's shrinkasizer! Time to solve these OKIDO antics!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep21

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep10

programme.desc: It's Time For An Easter Feast - JoJo, Gran Gran and all the family plan an Easter feast. When there isn't enough space in the kitchen to prepare the food, it's time for a Gran Gran plan outside in the garden.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Operation Dad - Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Future is Fuzzy - Nate hopes to spin a newfound gift into a bright future but soon discovers there's no fast track to success. Meanwhile, Dee Dee worries a new actress is stealing her spotlight and sets out to obliterate her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep275
programme.desc: Food PBBFT! Truck / Upturn Girls - SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a food truck in the darkest depths of the ocean. // Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!'/ Patrick the Mailman - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep110
programme.desc: A Very Rocky Rakhi/The Back Up Plan - It's Raksha Bandhan but Sammy can think of nothing worse than spending the day bonding with his sister. // The boys back up the App for safe keeping. Unfortunately, a tech malfunction causes the app to download to every phone on the house wifi!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep107
programme.desc: No Bones About It / Childish Antics - The mount has become a construction zone! Sammy and Raj need to find a way to fix this... // Sammy has his sights set on an Action Figure but it's 100 bucks! Luckily Malini has just the job for them...

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep119
programme.desc: A Stygi Situation - Jawbreaker finally chooses an alt-mode, but instead of changing into it, the alt-mode changes him.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Disarmed - Robby, Mo, and the Terrans attempt to unlock new Cybersleeve powers, with disastrous results.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Stuntin' / Olly Olly Organ Free - Patrick gets a stunt double. // Patrick's organs leave his body in protest.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep257
programme.desc: Handemonium / Breakin' - Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Prankaversary - Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep241
programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep268
programme.desc: A Place for Pets / Lockdown for Love - When customers bring pets into the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs soon realizes pets are more profitable than owners. // Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Patterfly Effect / A Space Affair to Remember - Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Friends and Family - The Terrans' erratic behavior may be reflecting Mo and Robby's anxiety about their first day at their new school. Or it could be something far worse...

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: Patnocchio / ChefBob - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards - Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: No Putts, No Glory - Alvin tricks Theodore into believing he's great at mini golf which backfires when Theo signs up for a tournament.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The House on Cedar Lane / Bathroom Bully - When classmates claim a local haunted house isn't that scary, Alvin decides to prove them wrong. // When Miss Smith praises Simon's grades in class, Derek bullies him by not allowing him to use the boys' bathroom.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: The Return of Thornbergaupht / Squashed - Simon's interactive video game is about to take off, until Jeanette reprograms the game's villain. // When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Invasion of the Squirrelanoids - While tracking mutagen, the Turtles bring a mutated squirrel back to the lair. When it starts multiplying, the Turtles must hunt the squirrel mutants and prevent them escaping into the city.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Mutagen Man Unleashed - Donatello obsessively experiments with mutagen in a bid to find a cure for April's mutated father. Unfortunately this puts April in danger from a new threat-Mutagen Man!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Mikey Gets Shellacne - Michelangelo is tired of being the "runt of the litter." But when he fools around with some mutagen, he gets a dangerous infection that is mutating out of control.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 3: Into the Inferno - Sokka, Toph and Suki begin destroying the airship fleet. Aang duels Ozai, but is soon overwhelmed because of his reluctance to kill him.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 4: Avatar Aang - Katara eventually defeats Azula by trapping her in ice, and heals Zuko. Sokka, Toph and Suki destroy the airship fleet.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Boy in the Iceberg - When a young waterbender, named Katara, and her brother, Sokka, discover a giant iceberg while fishing for food around their homestead at the South Pole, they discover that there is a boy, named Aang, inside.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Avatar Returns - After Aang accidentally sets off a Fire Nation trap, he is banished from the South Pole. Soon after Prince Zuko attacks the Southern Water Tribe seeking to capture the Avatar. Aang returns and surrenders to save the Water Tribe.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Tenta-Flakes / Boss Level - Best and Bester go on a mission to find out what gives their favourite cereal "Tenta-Flakes" such a purply taste. // Bester's outlandish ideas to make mini golf fun for the customers nearly lead to disaster, but Best saves the day.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Stage Struck / Ball Count - Best's sound effects threaten to derail Bester's one chance to shine on the opening night of a Flip Flop's play. // Best and Bester's "inbestigation" into some missing golf balls escalates into a full-blown mountain rescue mission.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Bucket Pants / A Best Too Far - Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this year's Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other people's ideas even if they haven't got a war room.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Trick or Treat Otis / Bedtime for Peepers - Otis gets mistaken for a real dog while trick or treating, and Abby and the group need to find him. // When Lex and Miranda have a party, Abby volunteers to put the playful Peepers to bed.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Fuzzly Slumber Party / Fix It Flug - The Fuzzlies are scared when they think there's a monster lurking around the hotel. // Princess Flug successfully helps Lex and Teeny Terry with her glitter goo, then goes overboard and "fixes" everything in the hotel.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep110
programme.desc: The Slumber Party / Grooming Gary - Pearl's getting ready for her slumber party, but Mr. Krabs' meddling in the party preparations is getting out of control. // SpongeBob decides to enter Gary in a pet show and gives him a makeover after seeing the competition.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep111
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants vs. The Big One - SpongeBob and his friends are swept away by a giant wave and find themselves stranded on a remote tropical island. To get back to Bikini Bottom, they need to learn how to surf from enigmatic surf guru, Jack Kahuna Lagun.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep112
programme.desc: Porous Pockets / Choir Boys - When SpongeBob suddenly becomes the richest citizen of Bikini Bottom, he finds himself surrounded by lots of new friends. // It's the day of Squidward's lead solo audition with the Bikini Bottom Men's Choir, and Squidward is brimming with excitement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep212
programme.desc: Sportz? - Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick for annoying him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep83
programme.desc: Rise and Shine / Waiting / Fungus Among Us - Take a look inside Patrick Star's rock where we see that his morning routine is anything but ordinary. // SpongeBob discovers that his breakfast cereal has an offer for free toy. // SpongeBob develops a case of Ick, the nasty itchy sea fungus.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep84
programme.desc: Spy Buddies / Boat Smarts / Good Old Whatshisname - Determined to uncover Planktons next plot, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob and Patrick to spy on him. // Watch an instructional video on boating techniques with Squidward and SpongeBob. // Mr. Krabs holds a contest for his employees.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep85
programme.desc: New Digs / Krabs a la Mode - After arriving one minute late for work, SpongeBob decides to move into the Krusty Krab so that he will never be late again. // When Plankton secretly turns down the thermostat at the Krusty Krab the entire restaurant freezes over.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Of Mice and Munks - The Chipettes fall in love with a cute little mouse that's doomed to be fed to a snake as part of a science class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Simon Saves the World - Simon's new invention threatens to destroy the world, creating a time loop and changing gravity inside the house.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - Milly Bradshaw and her partner Andrew Wilson want to build a modern farmhouse with natural materials. The brief to their architect was simple: a home that not only makes the best of its location, but is truly unique.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Dolphins Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A new history begins, but the Dolphins' journey is far from a comfortable ride...

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australia's deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Dan Bourchier.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt. (Return)

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Back Roads heads to north Queensland sugar cane country and the town of Home Hill. Presenter Heather Ewart discovers the heartwarming, and at times heartbreaking, stories of the families that first came here to cut cane.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Adam and Poh are heading to Tasmania on a quest to put together a not-so humble version of a classic Aussie Pie. They'll even attempt to answer the most controversial question of all... Do you want sauce with that?

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - A new set of teens aged from 14-16 years old, and seniors aged from 71-94 years old who live in a retirement village come together for an inspirational and powerful intergenerational experiment.

programme.title: Black Snow Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rumours and gossip are spreading around Ashford and suspicion is cast over Joe. Cormack continues to interview the 'time capsule kids' and more secrets rise to the surface.

programme.title: Framed Ep4

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: New Yorks Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between Thug Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Main Event - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.
